title: The Undead Day Fifteen
description: THE UK'S BEST-SELLING HORROR SERIES The Undead. Day Fifteen. The Fog. By Washington Post, WSJ, Audible & Amazon best-selling author RR Haywood. Creator of the smash-hit time travel series - Extracted, and the #1 sci-fi hit - The Worldship Humility, narrated by Colin Morgan, star of Merlin and Humans A deadly infection spreads across Europe.
